DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy IH636 grape seed proanthocyanidin extract treatment radiation-induced fibrosis high-dose radiotherapy woman history early breast cancer . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . Patients stratify accord time since prior radiotherapy . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral IH636 grape seed proanthocyanidin extract three time daily 6 month . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo three time daily 6 month . Patients follow 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 72 patient ( 48 arm I 24 arm II ) accrue study .
